features: Construction: Innovative horizontal baffle construction with hidden waist adjustment to maximize insulation benefits
Zipper: YKK two-way zipper, protected by a windproof flap with hidden snaps
Hood: Fixed with internal headband adjustment
Cuffs and Sleeves Configuration: Storm cuffs insulated for a secure and comfortable fit. Subtly drooping sleeves
Pockets: Two zippered hand pockets protected by a windproof flap and lined in microthermal polyester. Interior zippered pocket for easy access and the safe storage of essential items
Signature Quartz Co. patch: Black Alcantara Suede
